title: Skin Selection Bug
body:
Hello, 

I've experienced this a couple times since the new draft mode came out - sometimes I will select a skin (Spooky Gangplank, Project Fiora) and upon match start the game will randomly select another skin for me. In one instance it was Minuteman Gangplank (which I don't even own) and Nightraven Fiora even though I had clearly locked in the Project skin in queue. This seems to happen randomly. 

Thanks

replies.body: This should now be resolved - feel free to ping me if you're still seeing this.
